DataElementConcept.preferredName: Evaluation Defined Imaging Risk Factor Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.:An activity defined at the global library level whose intention is to obtain pictures of the interior or exterior of the body usually for diagnostic reasons._Any aspect of an individual's life, behavior, an environmental exposure, or an inborn or inherited characteristic that increases the likelihood of a disease, condition or injury._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Evaluation; the act of placing value on something.
